segments.text: Oh my goodness, look at all that water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and it's just pouring onto the cabinets and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be really deep in thought or something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, oh boy, they're going to be in so much trouble if they don't stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a recipe for disaster, water everywhere and kids climbing on stools.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everyone stays safe, this is quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR
